EmailTemplate.name: SM-2019-02-Container Platforms - Thank You.Completed Survey Thank You - Complete
EmailTemplate.subject: Your gift for meeting with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for meeting with a Turbonomic engineer. We hope you enjoyed your personalized demonstration! As a gift for your time, your $50.00 gift is enclosed below.
For a bit more context, check out these on-demand webinars:
- Tackling the Modern IT Ecosystem <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/on-demand-webinars/webinar-tackling-the-modern-it-infrastructure/utm_campaign=7012o000001oRWOAA2]]> - Self-Managing Kubernetes <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/on-demand-webinars/webinar-self-managing-kubernetes]]> - Using AI to Continuously Maximize Cloud Cost Savings <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/on-demand-webinars/webinar-using-artificial-intelligence-to-continuously-maximize-cloud-cost-saving/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRWOAA2]]>
I hope you find this information helpful as you continue your optimization journey. {{my.Gift 50:default=}}
Regards, Megan
